snippet.title: MLB roundup: Mariners name new president, ink two to MiLB deals; Giants acquire Huff
snippet.description:
MLB roundup: Mariners name new president, ink two to MiLB deals; Giants acquire Huff by Craig Goldstein on Jan 25 2014, 8:11a
The Mariners had a busy day Friday. Also, the Giants traded for some pitching depth and the Indians brought back a familiar face.

snippet.title: Former Mariners manager Eric Wedge, others allege turmoil in Seattle front office
snippet.description:
Former Mariners manager Eric Wedge, others allege turmoil in Seattle front office by Eric Stephen on Dec 8 2013, 7:02a
A report in the Seattle Times portrays disarray in the front office of the Mariners, losers of 451 games in five seasons under general manager Jack Zduriencik.

snippet.title: The Prospect: Montaous Walton just wanted to play ball, so he made up a fake online persona, fooled the media, signed with an agent and ended up in handcuffs
snippet.description:
The Prospect: Montaous Walton just wanted to play ball, so he made up a fake online persona, fooled the media, signed with an agent and ended up in handcuffs by Brandon Sneed on Jun 6 2013, 11:00a
Little Montaous Walton,come blow your horn. Another reporter is on the phone,Offering you escape from the scorn. Who is this boywho plays till he weeps? Living his dream,but still fast asleep....

snippet.title: Jackie Robinson gets Dicked around: The '60 Nixon-Robinson alliance
snippet.description:
Jackie Robinson gets Dicked around: The '60 Nixon-Robinson alliance by Steven Goldman on Apr 15 2013, 10:00a
It was one of the unlikeliest of political marriages, but No. 42 felt he had no choice.

snippet.title: Our New Point Guard-in-Chief
snippet.description:
Our New Point Guard-in-Chief by Dave Larzelere on Jan 19 2009, 7:22p
Though I am no presidential scholar, I dabble in the field. But armed with only my dilettante's knowledge, I still feel safe in saying that to the many historic firsts that will be marked with...
